image_ratio.label: Image Aspect Ratio
image_ratio.comment: Enter two numbers (width and height) separated by colon like 3:4, 1:1, etc. In this theme image width is preset, but height will be adjusted according to this setting

show_welcome_link.label: Show 'Welcome' Link
show_welcome_link.comment: This option adds/hides 'welcom User' link to the top

show_myaccount_link.label: Show 'My Account' Link
show_myaccount_link.comment: This option adds/hides 'My Account' link to the top

show_wishlist_link.label: Show 'Wishlist' Link
show_wishlist_link.comment: This option adds/hides 'Wishlist' link to the top

show_compare_link.label: Show 'Compare' Link
show_compare_link.comment: This option adds 'Compare' link to the top if there are at least 2 products to be compared

show_mycart_link.label: Show 'My Cart' Link
show_mycart_link.comment: This option adds/hides 'My Cart' link to the top

show_checkout_link.label: Show 'Checkout' Link
show_checkout_link.comment: This option adds/hides 'Checkout' link to the top

show_loginout_link.label: Show 'Log In / Log Out' Link
show_loginout_link.comment: This option adds/hides 'Log In / Log Out' link to the top

mobile_menu_width.label: Enable Mobile Menu Starting From Specified Screen Width
mobile_menu_width.comment: Width in pixels. Leave blank to disable mobile menu.

positioning.label: Sidebar Block Positioning
positioning.comment: Layered Navigation and Categories Block positions in System->Configuration->MANAdev->Layered Navigation->Filter Positioning

cart.label: Cart
cart.comment: If sidebar cart is enabled in System->Configuration->Sales->Checkout->Shopping Cart Sidebar

wishlist.label: Wishlist
wishlist.comment: If wishlist is enabled in System->Configuration->Customers->Wishlist->General Options

css.label: Sidebar Block Styles
css.comment: Change appearance of various blocks by entering one of predefined style names or even your own. This theme supports 'm-transparent', 'm-pink', 'm-lightgrey' and 'm-darkgrey', 'm-blue', 'm-line', 'm-shadow', 'm-top-shadow', 'm-right-shadow', 'm-bottom-shadow', 'm-left-shadow'. You may enter several style names separated by space.

compared.label: Recently Compared Products
compared.comment: Applies to Recently Compared Products Widget in Sidebar only

viewed.label: Recently Viewed Products
viewed.comment: Applies to Recently Viewed Products Widget in Sidebar only

new_products.label: New Products
new_products.comment: Applies to New Products Widget in Sidebar only

facebook_likebox.label: Facebook Like Box
facebook_likebox.comment: Applies to Facebook Like Box Widget in Sidebar only

random_guest_post.label: Random Guest Post
random_guest_post.comment: Applies to Random Guest Post Widget in Sidebar only

random_review.label: Random Product Review
random_review.comment: Applies to Random Product Review Widget in Sidebar only

manapage_bestseller.label: Bestsellers
manapage_bestseller.comment: Applies to Bestsellers Widget in Sidebar only

css.label: Style
css.comment: This theme supports 'm-transparent', 'm-pink', 'm-lightgrey' and 'm-darkgrey', 'm-blue', 'm-line', 'm-shadow', 'm-top-shadow', 'm-right-shadow', 'm-bottom-shadow', 'm-left-shadow' style names. You may enter several style names separated by space.
